item.title: Abby add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "This place where you are right now, God circled on a map for you." -- Hafiz

item.title: Abby add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "Fear is the cheapest room in the house. I would like to see you living In better conditions." -- Hafiz

item.title: Abby add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī
item.description:
"Our union is like this:
You feel cold so I reach for a blanket to cover our shivering feet.
A hunger comes into your body so I run to my garden and start digging potatoes.
You asked for a few words of comfort and guidance and I quickly kneel by your side offering you a whole book as a gift.
You ache with loneliness one night so much you weep, and I say
here is a rope, tie it around me, Hafiz will be your companion for life." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī

item.title: Abby add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez
item.description:
"Here soar Not with wings
But with your moving hands and feet And sweating brows -
Standing by your Beloved's side Reaching out to comfort this world
With your cup of solace Drawn from your vast reservoir of truth." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez

item.title: Abby add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez
item.description: "Not loving is a letting go. Listen, The terrain around here Is Far too Dangerous For That." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez
